name: BirdFeeder
description:
Once the game has started, click to start.

You are a bird. You escaped your zoo cage. You are feeding the other birds. The zookeeper is not happy. Feed the birds while avoiding the zookeeper.

There are two types of birds: Purple Cube Birds and Blue Sphere Birds. There are fruits correlating to each bird. If you bring the correct fruit to the correlating bird, you earn 3 points. Otherwise, you earn 1 point. 

A Game by Jenna Perkin and Alex Mojado
